pli-tv-bu-pm:0.2: The Theravada Monks’ Code of Rules
pli-tv-bu-pm:1.2: this is called “preparation” for the Uposatha.
pli-tv-bu-pm:2.1: Consent, purity, telling the season, counting the monks, and the exhortation:
pli-tv-bu-pm:2.2: this is called the “preliminary duty” for the Uposatha.
pli-tv-bu-pm:3.1: It is the Uposatha; all monks in the stated boundary are present;
pli-tv-bu-pm:3.3: no blameworthy monk is present: this is called “factors of readiness”.
